trans-unit.source: How to make a phone call from Twilio (PHP) - Azure
trans-unit.target: How to make a phone call from Twilio (PHP) - Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to make a phone call and send a SMS message with the Twilio API service on Azure. Samples are for PHP application.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to make a phone call and send a SMS message with the Twilio API service on Azure. Samples are for PHP application.

trans-unit.source: Comment faire un appel téléphonique à l'aide de Twilio dans une Application PHP sur Azure
trans-unit.target: Comment faire un appel téléphonique à l'aide de Twilio dans une Application PHP sur Azure

trans-unit.source: L'exemple suivant vous montre comment vous pouvez utiliser Twilio pour faire un appel d'une page web PHP hébergé dans Azure.
trans-unit.target: L'exemple suivant vous montre comment vous pouvez utiliser Twilio pour faire un appel d'une page web PHP hébergé dans Azure.

trans-unit.source: L'application invite l'utilisateur pour les valeurs de l'appel téléphonique, comme le montre la capture d'écran suivante.
trans-unit.target: L'application invite l'utilisateur pour les valeurs de l'appel téléphonique, comme le montre la capture d'écran suivante.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Formulaire d'appel d'Azur à l'aide de Twilio et PHP</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Formulaire d'appel d'Azur à l'aide de Twilio et PHP</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Vous devrez procéder comme suit pour utiliser le code dans cette rubrique :
trans-unit.target: Vous devrez procéder comme suit pour utiliser le code dans cette rubrique :

trans-unit.source: Acquérir une authentification et Twilio compte jeton.
trans-unit.target: Acquérir une authentification et Twilio compte jeton.

trans-unit.source: Pour commencer avec Twilio, évaluer le prix à <link><linkText>http://www.Twilio.com/pricing[twilio_pricing]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Pour commencer avec Twilio, évaluer le prix à <link><linkText>http://www.Twilio.com/pricing[twilio_pricing]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Vous pouvez vous inscrire pour un compte d'essai à <link><linkText>https://www.Twilio.com/try-Twilio[try_twilio]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Vous pouvez vous inscrire pour un compte d'essai à <link><linkText>https://www.Twilio.com/try-Twilio[try_twilio]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Pour plus d'informations sur l'API fournie par Twilio, consultez <link><linkText>http://www.Twilio.com/API[twilio_api]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d'informations sur l'API fournie par Twilio, consultez <link><linkText>http://www.Twilio.com/API[twilio_api]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Obtenir la bibliothèque Twilio pour PHP.
trans-unit.target: Obtenir la bibliothèque Twilio pour PHP.

trans-unit.source: Vous pouvez le télécharger depuis GitHub)<link><linkText>https://github.com/Twilio/Twilio-php[twilio_php_github]</linkText><title></title></link>) ou installer un package PEAR.
trans-unit.target: Vous pouvez le télécharger depuis GitHub)<link><linkText>https://github.com/Twilio/Twilio-php[twilio_php_github]</linkText><title></title></link>) ou installer un package PEAR.

trans-unit.source: Pour plus d'informations, consultez <link><linkText>https://github.com/Twilio/Twilio-php/BLOB/Master/Readme.MD[twilio_github_readme]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d'informations, consultez <link><linkText>https://github.com/Twilio/Twilio-php/BLOB/Master/Readme.MD[twilio_github_readme]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Installer le SDK Azure pour PHP.
trans-unit.target: Installer le SDK Azure pour PHP.

trans-unit.source: Pour un aperçu du SDK et des instructions sur l'installation il, voir <link><linkText>Configurer le SDK Azure pour PHP[setup_php_sdk]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Pour un aperçu du SDK et des instructions sur l'installation il, voir <link><linkText>Configurer le SDK Azure pour PHP[setup_php_sdk]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Créer un formulaire web pour effectuer un appel
trans-unit.target: Créer un formulaire web pour effectuer un appel

trans-unit.source: The following HTML code shows how to build a web page (callform.html) that retrieves user data for making a call:
trans-unit.target: The following HTML code shows how to build a web page (callform.html) that retrieves user data for making a call:

trans-unit.source: Create the code to make the call
trans-unit.target: Create the code to make the call

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to build a web page (makecall.php) which is called when the user submits the form displayed by callform.html.
trans-unit.target: The following code shows how to build a web page (makecall.php) which is called when the user submits the form displayed by callform.html.

trans-unit.source: The code shown below creates the call message and generates the call.
trans-unit.target: The code shown below creates the call message and generates the call.

trans-unit.source: (Use your Twilio account and authentication token instead of the placeholder values assigned to $sid et $token in the code below.)
trans-unit.target: (Use your Twilio account and authentication token instead of the placeholder values assigned to $sid et $token in the code below.)

trans-unit.source: In addition to making the call, makecall.php displays some call metadata (example shown in screenshot below).
trans-unit.target: In addition to making the call, makecall.php displays some call metadata (example shown in screenshot below).

trans-unit.source: For more information about call metadata, see <link><linkText>https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/rest/call#instance-properties[twilio_call_properties]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about call metadata, see <link><linkText>https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/rest/call#instance-properties[twilio_call_properties]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Azure Call Response Using Twilio and PHP</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Azure Call Response Using Twilio and PHP</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Run the application
trans-unit.target: Run the application

trans-unit.source: The next step is to deploy your application to Azure Websites.
trans-unit.target: The next step is to deploy your application to Azure Websites.

trans-unit.source: The following articles contain the information for creating a website and deploying your code with Git, FTP, or WebMatrix (though not all information in each article is relevant):
trans-unit.target: The following articles contain the information for creating a website and deploying your code with Git, FTP, or WebMatrix (though not all information in each article is relevant):

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Create a PHP-MySQL Azure Web Site and deploy using Git[website-git]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Create a PHP-MySQL Azure Web Site and deploy using Git[website-git]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Create a PHP-MySQL Azure Web Site and Deploy Using FTP[website-ftp]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Create a PHP-MySQL Azure Web Site and Deploy Using FTP[website-ftp]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Create and deploy a PHP-MySQL Azure Web Site using WebMatrix[website-webmatrix]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Create and deploy a PHP-MySQL Azure Web Site using WebMatrix[website-webmatrix]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Prochaines étapes
trans-unit.target: Prochaines étapes

trans-unit.source: This code was provided to show you basic functionality using Twilio in PHP on Azure.
trans-unit.target: This code was provided to show you basic functionality using Twilio in PHP on Azure.

trans-unit.source: Before deploying to Azure in production, you may want to add more error handling or other features.
trans-unit.target: Before deploying to Azure in production, you may want to add more error handling or other features.

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: For example:

trans-unit.source: Instead of using a web form, you could use Azure storage blobs or SQL Database to store phone numbers and call text.
trans-unit.target: Instead of using a web form, you could use Azure storage blobs or SQL Database to store phone numbers and call text.

trans-unit.source: For information about using Azure storage blobs in PHP, see <link><linkText>Using Azure Storage with PHP Applications[howto_blob_storage_php]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about using Azure storage blobs in PHP, see <link><linkText>Using Azure Storage with PHP Applications[howto_blob_storage_php]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: For information about using SQL Database in PHP, see <link><linkText>Using SQL Database with PHP Applications[howto_sql_azure_php]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about using SQL Database in PHP, see <link><linkText>Using SQL Database with PHP Applications[howto_sql_azure_php]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Le makecall.php code uses Twilio-provided URL (http://twimlets.com/message[twimlet_message_url]) to provide a Twilio Markup Language (TwiML) response that informs Twilio how to proceed with the call. For example, the TwiML that is returned can contain a verb that results in text being spoken to the call recipient. Instead of using the Twilio-provided URL, you could build your own service to respond to Twilio's request; for more information, see Comment utiliser Twilio pour voix et SMS en PHP[howto_twilio_voice_sms_php]. More information about TwiML can be found at http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml[twiml], and more information about and other Twilio verbs can be found at http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml/say[twilio_say].
trans-unit.target: Le makecall.php code uses Twilio-provided URL (http://twimlets.com/message[twimlet_message_url]) to provide a Twilio Markup Language (TwiML) response that informs Twilio how to proceed with the call. For example, the TwiML that is returned can contain a verb that results in text being spoken to the call recipient. Instead of using the Twilio-provided URL, you could build your own service to respond to Twilio's request; for more information, see Comment utiliser Twilio pour voix et SMS en PHP[howto_twilio_voice_sms_php]. More information about TwiML can be found at http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml[twiml], and more information about and other Twilio verbs can be found at http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml/say[twilio_say].

trans-unit.source: Read the Twilio security guidelines at <link><linkText>https://www.twilio.com/docs/security[twilio_docs_security]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Read the Twilio security guidelines at <link><linkText>https://www.twilio.com/docs/security[twilio_docs_security]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: For additional information about Twilio, see <link><linkText>https://www.twilio.com/docs[twilio_docs]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For additional information about Twilio, see <link><linkText>https://www.twilio.com/docs[twilio_docs]</linkText><title></title></link>.
